若即若離.definition: lit. seeming neither close nor distant (idiom); fig. to keep one's distance; (of a relationship) lukewarm; vague

若干.definition: a certain number or amount; how many?; how much?

若有所亡.definition: see 若有所失[ruo4 you3 suo3 shi1]

若有所喪.definition: see 若有所失[ruo4 you3 suo3 shi1]

若有所失.definition: as if one had lost something (idiom); to look or feel unsettled or distracted; to feel empty

若望.definition: John; Saint John; less common variant of 約翰|约翰[Yue1 han4] preferred by the Catholic Church

若望福音.definition: Gospel of John (used in Catholic Bible translations)

若無其事.definition: (idiom) as if nothing had happened; calm and composed; nonchalant

若爾蓋.definition: Zoigê County (Tibetan: mdzod dge rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan

若爾蓋縣.definition: Zoigê County (Tibetan: mdzod dge rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan

若羌.definition: Chaqiliq nahiyisi or Ruoqiang county in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州[Ba1 yin1 guo1 leng2 Meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

若羌縣.definition: Chaqiliq nahiyisi or Ruoqiang county in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州[Ba1 yin1 guo1 leng2 Meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

若翰.definition: John (less common form of 若望[Ruo4 wang4] or 約翰|约翰[Yue1 han4])

若要人不知，除非己莫為.pinyin: ruo4 yao4 ren2 bu4 zhi1 , chu2 fei1 ji3 mo4 wei2
若要人不知，除非己莫為.definition: If you don't want anyone to know, don't do it (idiom). fig. If you do something bad, people will inevitably hear about it.

若開山脈.definition: Arakan Yoma, mountain range in western Myanmar (Burma)

若非.definition: were it not for; if not for
